original: bod skad du /üîΩbcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bod skad du / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩbcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the mother of all the tathƒÅgatas of the three times, the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: gang zhig nyon mongs sgrib pa'i mun tshogs zla 'od bcas 'joms srid zhi'i mtshan mo mthar byed cing //
analyzed: gang zhig nyon mongs sgrib pa'i mun tshogs zla 'od bcas 'joms srid zhi'i mtshan mo mthar byed cing //
translated: She who destroys the mass of darkness of the afflictive obscurations along with the moonlight, bringing an end to the night of existence and peace,

original: dam chos shar gyi ri bo mthon po'i rtse nas mngon byung rab yangs shes bya'i mkha' la rab tu shar //
analyzed: dam chos shar gyi ri bo mthon po'i rtse nas mngon byung rab yangs shes bya'i mkha' la rab tu shar //
translated: Arisen from the peak of the eastern mountain of the true Dharma, it shines in the vast sky of knowledge.

original: phun tshogs sbyor bzhi rlung gi rta bcibs mkhyen gsum dkyil 'khor dri med sku bzhi'i gzi 'od rnam par 'phro //
analyzed: phun tshogs sbyor bzhi rlung gi rta bcibs mkhyen gsum dkyil 'khor dri med sku bzhi'i gzi 'od rnam par 'phro //
translated: Riding the horse of the four perfect endeavors, its three knowledges are the sun of the four bodies, radiating light.

original: tsha zer mdzad pas 'gro ba'i lo tog smin mdzad rgyal yum nyi ma shes rab pha rol phyin @2a * //
analyzed: tsha zer mdzad pas 'gro ba'i lo tog smin mdzad rgyal yum nyi ma shes rab pha rol phyin @2a * //
translated: The mother of the victors, the perfection of wisdom, the sun, ripens the harvest of beings.üîΩHomage to you!

original: phyag 'tshal // rgyal bas shes rab pha rol phyin don gang yin de lam gzhung gi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal // rgyal bas shes rab pha rol phyin don gang yin de lam gzhung gi bdag nyid can //
translated: The meaning of the perfection of wisdom, as taught by the victors, is the nature of the path of the treatise.

original: ji bzhin rnam gzhag sgrub byed dang ni bsgrub byas rgyu lam 'bras bu bzang bsgrags pa //
analyzed: ji bzhin rnam gzhag sgrub byed dang ni bsgrub byas rgyu lam 'bras bu bzang bsgrags pa //
translated: It is proclaimed to be the cause, the path, and the excellent result, as they are set forth, by the one who establishes and the one who is to be convinced.

original: blo ldan tshogs rnams la ni gsal bar thugs rjes rgyas 'bring bsdus mdzad bstan pa las //
analyzed: blo ldan tshogs rnams la ni gsal bar thugs rjes rgyas 'bring bsdus mdzad bstan pa las //
translated: From the teaching that is expanded, medium, or brief, out of compassion, to the assembly of wise ones,

original: rim gyis shes rab dman pa'i skye bo rnams kyis de yi don chen rtogs ma gyur //
analyzed: rim gyis shes rab dman pa'i skye bo rnams kyis de yi don chen rtogs ma gyur //
translated: the great meaning of this is not understood by those of lesser intelligence.

original: rtogs dka' rgyal ba'i yum lus zab cing rgya che brjod tshogs rgya mtsho'i nang du nub gyur pa //
analyzed: rtogs dka' rgyal ba'i yum lus zab cing rgya che brjod tshogs rgya mtsho'i nang du nub gyur pa //
translated: The difficult to understand, profound and vast Mother of the Victorious Ones, has sunk into the ocean of the multitude of expressions.

original: de don mngon gzigs bcom ldan byams pa'i blo gros nyid dang brtse ba'i lcags kyus gdon mdzad de //
analyzed: de don mngon gzigs bcom ldan byams pa'i blo gros nyid dang brtse ba'i lcags kyus gdon mdzad de //
translated: The Bhagavat Maitreya, who has seen her meaning, has extracted her with the hook of his love, with his own intelligence.

original: dngos brgyad rang bzhin rnam gzhag dang ni brgyad bzos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gzhung dri med phreng //
analyzed: dngos brgyad rang bzhin rnam gzhag dang ni brgyad bzos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gzhung dri med phreng //
translated: He has taught the eight topics, the presentation of the nature, and the stainless garland of the treatise of the AbhisamayƒÅla·πÖkƒÅra,

original: rin chen 'od 'phro mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams la ni legs bstan rab tu dga' ba bskyed par mdzad //
analyzed: rin chen 'od 'phro mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams la ni legs bstan rab tu dga' ba bskyed par mdzad //
translated: to the assembly of scholars, the shining jewels, and has generated the supreme joy.

original: thogs med mgon gyis de don mdor bshad blo gros phun tshogs dbyig gnyen gyis //
analyzed: thogs med mgon gyis de don mdor bshad blo gros phun tshogs dbyig gnyen gyis //
translated: The protector Asanga has explained her meaning in brief, and Vasubandhu, who is endowed with intelligence,

original: rnam rig tshul bkrol ji bzhin don min 'phags pa rnam par grol bas ni //
analyzed: rnam rig tshul bkrol ji bzhin don min 'phags pa rnam par grol bas ni //
translated: has explained the meaning of the Vij√±apti-mƒÅtratƒÅ-siddhi, but not exactly as it is.

original: mtha' bral don gyi de nyid rnam phye mkhas pa'i skye bo rnam grol sdes //
analyzed: mtha' bral don gyi de nyid rnam phye mkhas pa'i skye bo rnam grol sdes //
translated: The noble Vimuktasena has distinguished the meaning of reality free from extremes, and the one called Vi≈õe·π£amitra

original: rang blos rjes rtags de rjes @2b rgyal sras seng ge bzang pos rang bshad mdzad //
analyzed: rang blos rjes rtags de rjes @2b rgyal sras seng ge bzang pos rang bshad mdzad //
translated: has explained it according to his own understanding, and the son of the Victorious Ones, Haribhadra, has explained it according to himself.

original: de ltar mkhas pas phal cher don //
analyzed: de ltar mkhas pas phal cher don //
translated: Thus, the wise, for the most part,

original: snang gyur byas kyang 'ga' zhig min //
analyzed: snang gyur byas kyang 'ga' zhig min //
translated: see the meaning, even if it is not stated.

original: de phyir don gnyer phan brtson pas //
analyzed: de phyir don gnyer phan brtson pas //
translated: Therefore, those who seek the meaning and strive for benefit

original: mtha' dag 'grel ba bya bar 'os //
analyzed: mtha' dag 'grel ba bya bar 'os //
translated: are worthy to compose a commentary on the entire text.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin lus mchog / mngon rtogs rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin lus mchog / mngon rtogs rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
translated: The body of the perfection of wisdom is adorned with the precious ornament of realization,

original: de rab gsal byed 'grel pa ni //
analyzed: de rab gsal byed 'grel pa ni //
translated: and the commentary that illuminates it

original: shes rab sgron ma'i phreng ba bya //
analyzed: shes rab sgron ma'i phreng ba bya //
translated: should be composed as a garland of lamps of wisdom.

original: 'phags pa byams pa bdag nyid dams pa rnams kyi spyod pa rab tu mthun par ston cing rang gi bstan bcos brtsams pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba dang / gtsor gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das ma yon tan rin po che phul du dbyung du med cing dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas la cher spro bas dang ba bskyed pa'i ched du dang po re zhig 'phags pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
analyzed: 'phags pa byams pa bdag nyid dams pa rnams kyi spyod pa rab tu mthun par ston cing rang gi bstan bcos brtsams pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba dang / gtsor gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das ma yon tan rin po che phul du dbyung du med cing dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas la cher spro bas dang ba bskyed pa'i ched du dang po re zhig 'phags pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
translated: In order to show the conduct of the noble Maitreya in perfect accord with the afflicted, and to perfect the composition of his treatise, and primarily to generate great enthusiasm and faith in others towards the Blessed Mother, the inexhaustible and immeasurable source of precious qualities, first of all, the noble Perfection of Wisdom, the mother of all noble ones, is to be explained.

original: pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi phyag 'tshal bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi phyag 'tshal bar mdzad pa /
translated: The homage is preceded by a statement of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang // 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
analyzed: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang // 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
translated: Homage to the one who, by means of the knowledge of all things, leads to peace those who seek the peace of the disciples, and who, by means of the knowledge of paths, accomplishes the aims of the world for those who act to benefit the world.

original: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa //
analyzed: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa //
translated: By virtue of which the Muni, endowed with all aspects, has taught this variety.

original: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yul de la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yul de la phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the object of the Buddhas, together with the hosts of disciples and bodhisattvas.

original: zhes bya'o // de la re zhig dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstan pa'i che ba thos pa nyid na 'di la the tshom med pa rab tu dang ba skye ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de la re zhig dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstan pa'i che ba thos pa nyid na 'di la the tshom med pa rab tu dang ba skye ba'o //
translated: Here, those who follow by faith, upon hearing the greatness taught by this verse, give rise to faith without doubt.

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshad ma rnams kyi gzhi dang lam dang rnam pa skye ba med par yongs su shes pa'i yum la gnod pa ma mthong zhing shes
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshad ma rnams kyi gzhi dang lam dang rnam pa skye ba med par yongs su shes pa'i yum la gnod pa ma mthong zhing shes
translated: And those who follow the Dharma, because they are free from the nature of one and many, and so on, do not see any harm in the mother, the perfection of wisdom, which is the basis, path, and aspect of valid knowledge, which is the non-arising of all phenomena.üîΩTherefore, the buddhas and so on are known to be the creators of the special qualities of familiarity with the perfection of wisdom, which has the nature of the three modes.üîΩThus, one should generate clear faith.üîΩBy that faith, one should generate the desire to practice.

original: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul gsum pa can gyi bdag nyid goms pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi khyad par du 'gyur ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa ni bskrun par mdzad pa nyid do zhes shes par byas te mngon par dang ba skyed par
analyzed: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul gsum pa can gyi bdag nyid goms pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi khyad par du 'gyur ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa ni bskrun par mdzad pa nyid do zhes shes par byas te mngon par dang ba skyed par
translated: By that desire, one should generate the aspiration.

original: byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: byed pa nyid do //
translated: By that aspiration, one should generate the application.üîΩBy that application, one should generate the attainment.üîΩBy that attainment, one should generate the special attainment.üîΩBy that special attainment, one should generate the supreme attainment.üîΩBy that supreme attainment, one should generate the supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme attainment, one should generate the supreme special supreme attainment.üîΩBy that supreme special supreme attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.

original: de la dang bas ni de'i don @3a * //
analyzed: de la dang bas ni de'i don @3a * //
translated: By that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.üîΩBy that supreme supreme special attainment, one should generate the supreme supreme special attainment.

original: yongs su bsgrub par bya 'dod pas gzung ba la sogs pa'i don gyis rnam pa thams cad du rab tu gus par byed pa dang / de las kyang thos pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa gsum ci rigs par thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su bsgrub par bya 'dod pas gzung ba la sogs pa'i don gyis rnam pa thams cad du rab tu gus par byed pa dang / de las kyang thos pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa gsum ci rigs par thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One who wishes to accomplish it should be very respectful in every way by means of the objects of apprehension, etc. and from that, by means of hearing, etc., one will obtain the three kinds of omniscience in whatever way is appropriate.

original: de la yul nyid dang / sbyor ba nyid dang / 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa gsum gyi sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis don brgyad bsdus par dgongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstod do //
analyzed: de la yul nyid dang / sbyor ba nyid dang / 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa gsum gyi sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis don brgyad bsdus par dgongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstod do //
translated: With the thought that the three kinds of omniscience include the eight topics by means of the three, namely, object, application, and result, etc., the Perfection of Wisdom is praised.

original: 'di ltar nyan thos dang de'i phyogs su bsdus pa rnam par thar pa cung zad cig gis lhag pa rang sangs rgyas kyang ste mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba rnams phung po la sogs pa'i gzhi thams cad skye ba med par yongs su shes pa
analyzed: 'di ltar nyan thos dang de'i phyogs su bsdus pa rnam par thar pa cung zad cig gis lhag pa rang sangs rgyas kyang ste mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba rnams phung po la sogs pa'i gzhi thams cad skye ba med par yongs su shes pa
translated: Thus, the disciples and those included in their category, the solitary realizers who are slightly superior to them, and those who strive for nirvana, completely understand that all the bases of the aggregates, etc. are unarisen.

original: nyid kyis phung po dang bcas pa dang phung po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis thob par mdzad pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyis 'khor ba ji srid par 'gro ba'i don byed pa rnams nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pa nyid kyis 'jig rten pa rnams la phan cing bde bar mdzad pa gang yin pa dang
analyzed: nyid kyis phung po dang bcas pa dang phung po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis thob par mdzad pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyis 'khor ba ji srid par 'gro ba'i don byed pa rnams nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pa nyid kyis 'jig rten pa rnams la phan cing bde bar mdzad pa gang yin pa dang
translated: The second is the benefit and happiness of mundane beings through the realization that the paths of the sravakas and others are unborn.

original: / chos thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du gyur pa gang dang yang dag par ldan na sku gsung thugs yang dag par bsdams pa'i sku can rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug gi gtso bo rnams spyod pa'i gnyen por chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs pa ma
analyzed: / chos thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du gyur pa gang dang yang dag par ldan na sku gsung thugs yang dag par bsdams pa'i sku can rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug gi gtso bo rnams spyod pa'i gnyen por chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs pa ma
translated: The third is the turning of the wheel of the Dharma, which is the antidote to the conduct of those who possess the body, speech, and mind of perfect liberation and who are the principal lords of yoga.

original: lus pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa bskor bar mdzad pa gang yin pa nyan thos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid kyis yongs su bskor ba de lta bu sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis de dag gi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: lus pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa bskor bar mdzad pa gang yin pa nyan thos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid kyis yongs su bskor ba de lta bu sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis de dag gi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: The homage is to the perfection of wisdom, the mother of those who have attained, who are attaining, and who will attain the unsurpassed enlightenment, by means of the three vehicles, the Listeners', the Self-Buddhas', and the Bodhisattvas', which are distinguished by the difference in their lineage.

original: 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyan ni gzhi dang gnyen po dang rnam pa mtha' dag mngon par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid brgyad du phye zhing bsdus pas nye bar ston par mdzad pa'i phyir mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin @3b gyis rnam
analyzed: 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyan ni gzhi dang gnyen po dang rnam pa mtha' dag mngon par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid brgyad du phye zhing bsdus pas nye bar ston par mdzad pa'i phyir mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin @3b gyis rnam
translated: Here, the Ornament of the Perfection of Wisdom is taught by dividing and summarizing the perfection of wisdom into eight topics, which are the basis, the antidote, and the complete aspects. Therefore, it is appropriate that this treatise be presented in terms of the three knowledges.

original: par gzhag pa 'di 'tsham pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: par gzhag pa 'di 'tsham pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is tenable to say that this treatise is appropriate.

original: 'di ltar rgyal ba'i yum bar ma las /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyal ba'i yum bar ma las /
translated: As it says in the middle-length Perfection of Wisdom:

original: rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
translated: Subh≈´ti, the knowledge of all modes is that of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: lam shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin no //
analyzed: lam shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin no //
translated: The knowledge of paths is that of the bodhisattvas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is that of the tathƒÅgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad 'tshal ba nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad 'tshal ba nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags /
translated: ‚ÄúLord, why is the knowledge of all modes that of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas?

original: rab 'byor thams cad ces bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi chos ji snyed pa 'di tsam yin la /
analyzed: rab 'byor thams cad ces bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi chos ji snyed pa 'di tsam yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, the so-called all is just this many inner and outer dharmas.

original: de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes kyi /
analyzed: de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes kyi /
translated: ≈örƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas know them,

original: lam thams cad kyis kyang ma yin la rnam pa thams cad du yang ma yin pas /
analyzed: lam thams cad kyis kyang ma yin la rnam pa thams cad du yang ma yin pas /
translated: but not by all paths and not in all aspects.

original: de'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the knowledge of all modes of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa 'tshal ba nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa 'tshal ba nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lags /
translated: ‚ÄúLord, why is the knowledge of the aspects of the path itself that of the bodhisattvas?‚Äù

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni nyan thos kyi lam gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa'i lam thams cad bskyed par bya zhing lam thams cad shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni nyan thos kyi lam gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa'i lam thams cad bskyed par bya zhing lam thams cad shes par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, bodhisattvas should develop all the paths‚Äîwhatever the paths of ≈õrƒÅvakas, whatever the paths of pratyekabuddhas, and whatever the paths of buddhas are‚Äîand they should know all the paths.

original: de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing de dag gi lam gyi byang ba yang bya la /
analyzed: de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing de dag gi lam gyi byang ba yang bya la /
translated: They should also complete them, and they should purify the path of those.

original: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma sbyangs par de dag gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o /
analyzed: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma sbyangs par de dag gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o /
translated: But they should not actualize the very limit of reality without completing their prayers, without developing living beings, and without purifying a buddhafield.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the bodhisattvas‚Äô knowledge of the aspects of the path.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúLord, how many perfections do the bodhisattvas‚Äô knowledge of the aspects of the path include?‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, the bodhisattvas‚Äô knowledge of the aspects of the path includes all the perfections.

original: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags //üîΩrab 'byor rnam pa gang dag dang rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gi chos rnams rab tu brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang / rtags @4a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags // rab 'byor rnam pa gang dag dang rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gi chos rnams rab tu brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang / rtags @4a * //
translated: BhagavƒÅn, why is the knowledge of all aspects the knowledge of the TathƒÅgatas, the Arhats, the Perfectly Awakened Ones?

original: de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de /
analyzed: de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de /
translated: Subh≈´ti, the TathƒÅgata has realized those aspects, those signs, and those marks by which phenomena are expressed.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the knowledge of all aspects of the TathƒÅgatas, the Arhats, the Perfectly Awakened Ones.

original: de bzhin du mdor bsdus pa las kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du mdor bsdus pa las kyang /
translated: Similarly, the Condensed says:

original: nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la /
translated: Even those who wish to train in the ≈õrƒÅvaka level should do this and so on.

original: rgyas pa las kyang rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyas pa las kyang rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: And it is taught extensively in the extensive version.

original: de la thams cad shes pa nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rten can 'bras bu bdag tu rmongs pa spangs pa can yin no //üîΩlam shes pa nyid ni theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / de kho na nyid mngon sum du mi byed pa'i rten can 'bras bu sems can ma bsdus pa sdud pa la sogs par byed pa can yin no //
analyzed: de la thams cad shes pa nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rten can 'bras bu bdag tu rmongs pa spangs pa can yin no // lam shes pa nyid ni theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / de kho na nyid mngon sum du mi byed pa'i rten can 'bras bu sems can ma bsdus pa sdud pa la sogs par byed pa can yin no //
translated: The knowledge of all phenomena is the basis of the impermanence of all phenomena such as form, etc., and its result is the abandonment of delusion concerning the self of the effect.üîΩThe knowledge of the path is the basis of the deliverance of all vehicles and its result is the abandonment of the noninclusion of sentient beings, etc.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i rten can 'bras bu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa nyid ni mtha' rtogs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa can yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i rten can 'bras bu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa nyid ni mtha' rtogs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa can yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the basis of the nonproduction of all phenomena and its result is the uninterrupted benefit of sentient beings throughout space and the realization of the limit of reality and the abandonment of the afflictions that are the connection of latencies.

original: gal te stong pa nyid thugs rje phun sum tshogs pa yin na des rgyas pa dang 'bring dang mdor bsdus pa la dad pas tshul de nyid kyis mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi rim pa gsal bar mdzad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te stong pa nyid thugs rje phun sum tshogs pa yin na des rgyas pa dang 'bring dang mdor bsdus pa la dad pas tshul de nyid kyis mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi rim pa gsal bar mdzad pa ma yin nam /
translated: If emptiness is the perfection of compassion, then by that very method, the eight stages of clear realization are elucidated, according to the extensive, medium, and brief teachings.

original: yang ci zhig bstan du yod ces dogs pa'i gnas bsal nas don la the tshom skyed pa nyid kyis gzhug pa dang / gzhan dag kyang de'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: yang ci zhig bstan du yod ces dogs pa'i gnas bsal nas don la the tshom skyed pa nyid kyis gzhug pa dang / gzhan dag kyang de'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Having cleared away doubts about what is to be taught, he engages the reader by generating doubt about the meaning, and others will also come to certainty by following him.

original: rab tu byed pa'i lus yang dag par mdzes pa nyid kyi phyir yang 'jug pa'i yan lag rang gi bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa dang / 'brel ba don gyis thob pa rnams gsungs te /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa'i lus yang dag par mdzes pa nyid kyi phyir yang 'jug pa'i yan lag rang gi bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa dang / 'brel ba don gyis thob pa rnams gsungs te /
translated: Or, in order to make the body of the treatise beautiful, he states the topic of his treatise, the purpose, the purpose of the purpose, and the connection, which are implicitly understood.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lam //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lam //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the path.

original: ston pas 'di la bshad pa gang /
analyzed: ston pas 'di la bshad pa gang /
translated: The teacher has explained this.

original: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin te //
analyzed: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin te //
translated: It is not experienced by others.

original: @4b chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: @4b chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
translated: The intention of the composition is this:

original: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
analyzed: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
translated: Having established the meaning of the sutra in the memory of the ten dharmas,

original: blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir //üîΩbde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes //üîΩbya ba rtsom pa'i dgongs pa yin //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir // bde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes // bya ba rtsom pa'i dgongs pa yin //
translated: the wise one will see it,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and thus it is called ‚Äúeasily understood.‚Äù

original: 'dis ni brjod par bya ba med pa dang / bsgrub par mi nus pa dang / 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa dang / 'brel ba med pa zhes bya ba'i mtha' bzhi rnam par bsal ba nyid yin no //üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
analyzed: 'dis ni brjod par bya ba med pa dang / bsgrub par mi nus pa dang / 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa dang / 'brel ba med pa zhes bya ba'i mtha' bzhi rnam par bsal ba nyid yin no // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
translated: This very thing removes the four extremes called ‚Äúinexpressible,‚Äù ‚Äúunprovable,‚Äù ‚Äúundesirable,‚Äù and ‚Äúunrelated.‚Äù

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the path traversed and followed by the perfect Buddhas when they appear and will appear.

original: bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis ma lus pa'i lus can la rjes su ston par mdzad pa de nyid kyis rgyal ba'i yum de dang de dag la yul dang thabs dang / 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i tshul gyis 'brel par bstan pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis ma lus pa'i lus can la rjes su ston par mdzad pa de nyid kyis rgyal ba'i yum de dang de dag la yul dang thabs dang / 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i tshul gyis 'brel par bstan pa //
translated: The Blessed One, by means of the three kinds of miracles, teaches all embodied beings without exception. By means of those very [miracles], he teaches the connection between the Mother of the Victorious Ones and the objects, means, and results, in terms of the method of establishing the means of accomplishment and the object of accomplishment.

original: phyi rol pa dang cig shos kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa chos thams cad bdag med par goms par ma byas pa rnams kyi thos pa la sogs pa rnams byung ba'i shes rab kyi lces rab tu ma myangs pa'i bdud rtsi gang yin pa de
analyzed: phyi rol pa dang cig shos kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa chos thams cad bdag med par goms par ma byas pa rnams kyi thos pa la sogs pa rnams byung ba'i shes rab kyi lces rab tu ma myangs pa'i bdud rtsi gang yin pa de
translated: For those who are not free from attachment to external and internal things, and who have not cultivated the selflessness of all phenomena, the nectar that is not tasted by the tongue of wisdom that arises from listening, etc.,

original: ni brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ni brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: is to be expressed.

original: blo gros dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'i don mngon par rtogs pa ma lus pa yi ger 'dri ba dang klog pa la sogs pa kun tu spyod pa'i gnas bcu po dag gi don ji lta bar legs par thos nas tshul
analyzed: blo gros dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'i don mngon par rtogs pa ma lus pa yi ger 'dri ba dang klog pa la sogs pa kun tu spyod pa'i gnas bcu po dag gi don ji lta bar legs par thos nas tshul
translated: The intelligent, having heard well the meaning of the ten topics of practice, such as writing, reading, etc., of the entire realization of the meaning of the Perfection of Wisdom Sutras,

original: bzhin du nye bar bsams pas bag chags kyis bsgos pa yang dag par dran pa'i shes pa la bzhag nas chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba rtogs pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rnam pa thams cad du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba ni dgos pa'i dgos
analyzed: bzhin du nye bar bsams pas bag chags kyis bsgos pa yang dag par dran pa'i shes pa la bzhag nas chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba rtogs pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rnam pa thams cad du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba ni dgos pa'i dgos
translated: having properly reflected on them, having placed the consciousness that remembers the perfuming of the alayavijnana in the realization of the all-pervading dharmadhatu, etc., will actualize it in every way. This is the purpose of the purpose.

original: pa ste ; de'i phyir de dag gi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs pa rnams kyi rim pa nyid nye bar bsal ba'i don du gdul bya rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par byed pa ni rab tu byed pa'i don rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: pa ste ; de'i phyir de dag gi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs pa rnams kyi rim pa nyid nye bar bsal ba'i don du gdul bya rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par byed pa ni rab tu byed pa'i don rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to clarify the very stages of the realizations of those characteristics, the purpose of composing the treatise is to make them easily understood by the disciples.

original: de bas na brjod par bya ba'i don can las de @5a * //
analyzed: de bas na brjod par bya ba'i don can las de @5a * //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the expression is understood by the teaching, and the ultimate meaning is attained by implication.

original: bstan pas rab tu rtogs pas ni don mthar thug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i shugs kyis thob pa nyid dang / de las byung ba'i tshul gyis 'brel ba khong du gnas pa ni don gyi mthu yin no //
analyzed: bstan pas rab tu rtogs pas ni don mthar thug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i shugs kyis thob pa nyid dang / de las byung ba'i tshul gyis 'brel ba khong du gnas pa ni don gyi mthu yin no //
translated: The connection is understood by the method of origination, and the power of the meaning is understood.

original: de'i 'og tu bstan bcos kyi gzhung nyid 'chad par bzhed de /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bstan bcos kyi gzhung nyid 'chad par bzhed de /
translated: After that, he wishes to explain the treatise itself.

original: gdul bya rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bstan bcos rnam par dbye ba byas pa yang spyi'i don gyis rnam par bcings pas rab tu mdzes shing ma 'dzings pa nyid kyi 'chad pa po rnams kyang sla bas legs pa ston par 'gyur bar gzigs nas tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis kyi mdo dang /
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bstan bcos rnam par dbye ba byas pa yang spyi'i don gyis rnam par bcings pas rab tu mdzes shing ma 'dzings pa nyid kyi 'chad pa po rnams kyang sla bas legs pa ston par 'gyur bar gzigs nas tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis kyi mdo dang /
translated: In order to make it easy for disciples to understand, and because the analysis of the treatise is also bound by the general meaning, he sees that the explanation is very beautiful and not entangled, and the expounders are also easy, so he composes the treatise in two chapters.

original: bcu gsum gyis rgyas par bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa las re zhig spyir bstan pa'i tshul gyis gang gis gang zhig ji ltar bshad pa /
analyzed: bcu gsum gyis rgyas par bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa las re zhig spyir bstan pa'i tshul gyis gang gis gang zhig ji ltar bshad pa /
translated: From among those, the explanation by way of general indication is ‚ÄúBy whom, what, and how is it explained?‚Äù

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: dngos po brgyad kyi yang dag bshad //
analyzed: dngos po brgyad kyi yang dag bshad //
translated: is explained as eight topics.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: It is stated.

original: gzhung gtso bor bzung bas lam dang don gyi bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum dang / mngon par rtogs pa bzhi dang / chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa brgyad kyis ji lta ba dang /
analyzed: gzhung gtso bor bzung bas lam dang don gyi bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum dang / mngon par rtogs pa bzhi dang / chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa brgyad kyis ji lta ba dang /
translated: Since the text is taken as primary, the perfection of wisdom, which is the nature of the path and the meaning, is explained as eight topics: the three knowledges, the four realizations, and the truth body together with its deeds.

original: ji snyed pa'i don yang dag par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ji snyed pa'i don yang dag par bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is the perfect explanation of the meaning of the mode and the varieties.

original: dngos po brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight topics?

original: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
analyzed: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects, the knowledge of the path,

original: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
analyzed: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
translated: then the knowledge of all things,

original: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang / rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa //
analyzed: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang / rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa //
translated: 1. Realization of the complete perfection of all aspects, 2. Reaching the peak, 3. The serial one,

original: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
analyzed: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
translated: 4. And the instantaneous perfect enlightenment.

original: chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad //üîΩces gsungs te /üîΩma lus pa'i rnam pa mthar thug pa mngon sum du mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid snang ba dang bcas pa dang cig shos kyi bdag nyid can gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par yongs su gzigs pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad // ces gsungs te / ma lus pa'i rnam pa mthar thug pa mngon sum du mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid snang ba dang bcas pa dang cig shos kyi bdag nyid can gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par yongs su gzigs pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The Dharma Body has these eight aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects has the characteristic of directly perceiving all aspects without exception, in their ultimate extent, together with their appearance, and the opposite of that.üîΩThe knowledge of all paths has the characteristic of seeing the nature of all paths as being unborn, and it has the nature of both meditative equipoise and post-meditation.

original: mnyam par bzhag pa dang ma bzhag pa'i bdag nyid can gyi lam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / gzhi thams cad mngon par rtogs @5b pa'i mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi bdag nyid can gyi gzhi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pa dang ma bzhag pa'i bdag nyid can gyi lam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / gzhi thams cad mngon par rtogs @5b pa'i mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi bdag nyid can gyi gzhi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
translated: The knowledge of all bases has the characteristic of realizing all bases, and it has the nature of both the discordant class and the class of antidotes.

original: de dag gi don cig car bsdus shing rnam par sgom pa'i mtshan nyid las dang po pa dang / sbyor ba dang / mthong ba dang / bsgom pa'i gnas skabs can rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa nyid dang / de nyid rnam pa thams cad du rang gi dbang du gyur pa'i mtshan nyid sbyor ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs can rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de dag gi don cig car bsdus shing rnam par sgom pa'i mtshan nyid las dang po pa dang / sbyor ba dang / mthong ba dang / bsgom pa'i gnas skabs can rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa nyid dang / de nyid rnam pa thams cad du rang gi dbang du gyur pa'i mtshan nyid sbyor ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs can rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang /
translated: The peak is the nature of the complete and perfect realization of the peak, which is the stage of training, seeing, and meditation.

original: chos rnam par dkar ba rnams dang lhan cig rim gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par gnas pa dang cig shos kyi mtshan nyid gnas skabs can mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad cig car mngon sum du gyur pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par smin pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs can skad cig mas mngon par byang chub pa'i mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad duüîΩmtshan ma thams cad spangs shing //
analyzed: chos rnam par dkar ba rnams dang lhan cig rim gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par gnas pa dang cig shos kyi mtshan nyid gnas skabs can mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad cig car mngon sum du gyur pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par smin pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs can skad cig mas mngon par byang chub pa'i mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mtshan ma thams cad spangs shing //
translated: The clear realizations of the serial approach are the clear realizations of the serial approach, which are characterized by the gradual completion of the factors of complete purification of phenomena and the clear realizations of the instantaneous approach, which are characterized by the simultaneous direct experience of all incorruptible phenomena and are not subject to the process of karmic ripening.

original: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid rdzogs par longs spyod pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid chos kyi sku nyid de /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid rdzogs par longs spyod pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid chos kyi sku nyid de /
translated: The clear realizations of the consummate approach are the dharmakaya itself, which is characterized by the complete enlightenment that is the direct experience of all phenomena in all their aspects, the relinquishment of all attributes and the complete enjoyment of the fruition of enlightenment.

original: mtshan nyid dang / thabs dang / 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyis rnam pa brgyad do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang / thabs dang / 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyis rnam pa brgyad do //
translated: These are the eight aspects of the consummate approach, which are characterized by the nature of the fruition, the means and the fruition itself.

original: de la chos du zhig gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos du zhig gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge of all aspects of phenomena?üîΩThe generation of the mind, the instructions,

original: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang // nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang // sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang // nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang // sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa //
translated: the four aspects of penetration, and the basis of practice,üîΩthe nature of the dharmadhatu,üîΩthe objects, the purpose,üîΩthe armor, the activity of engagement,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang // dmigs pa dag dang ched dag dang // go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang // tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang // dmigs pa dag dang ched dag dang // go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang // tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams //
translated: and the accumulations with their certain deliverance,

original: thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid //
analyzed: thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid //
translated: are the knowledge of all aspects of the Sage.

original: ces gsungs te ;
analyzed: ces gsungs te ;
translated: It is said:üîΩThe twenty-two generations of the mind, such as the aspiration of one who desires perfect enlightenment for the sake of others,

original: gzhan gyi don du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i bdag nyid 'dun pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / gdul bya rnams dang 'tsham pa'i don ston par sgrub pa la sogs pa gdams pa bcu dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa @6a * //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i bdag nyid 'dun pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / gdul bya rnams dang 'tsham pa'i don ston par sgrub pa la sogs pa gdams pa bcu dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa @6a * //
translated: the ten instructions such as practice that establishes the teaching of the meaning in accordance with those to be tamed,üîΩthe four aspects of penetration such as heat,

original: dang ; gnyen po'i phyogs kyi gzung ba mi dmigs pa dro ba dang rtse mor gyur pa dang / gang zag dang skyes bu'i 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag rnam pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: dang ; gnyen po'i phyogs kyi gzung ba mi dmigs pa dro ba dang rtse mor gyur pa dang / gang zag dang skyes bu'i 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag rnam pa bzhi dang /
translated: The four aspects of the branches of definite discernment are the heat and peak stages, which are the nonobservation of the apprehended object of the side of the antidote and the acceptance and supreme mundane quality stages, which are the pacification of the apprehension of the person and the individual.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i chos la sogs pa bcu gsum gyi rten du gyur pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs par bya ba dge ba la sogs pa bcu gcig pa dang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i chos la sogs pa bcu gsum gyi rten du gyur pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs par bya ba dge ba la sogs pa bcu gcig pa dang /
translated: The eleven aspects of the object of observation are the nature of the dharmadhatu, which is the support of the thirteen, such as the realization of the nature that is pure by nature, and the eleven, such as virtue, which are objects of observation by way of not observing them through the character of the ultimate and the conventional.

original: gang gi ched du bya ba sems chen po la sogs pa gsum dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha'i sgrub ba drug dang / theg pa mchog gi yul du 'jug pa'i phyir bsam gtan la sogs pa 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dgu dang /
analyzed: gang gi ched du bya ba sems chen po la sogs pa gsum dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha'i sgrub ba drug dang / theg pa mchog gi yul du 'jug pa'i phyir bsam gtan la sogs pa 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dgu dang /
translated: The three great minds and so forth are the purpose for which one acts. The six practices of the armor of the six perfections are for the purpose of not being harmed by adverse factors. The nine practices of engaging in concentration and so forth are for the purpose of engaging in the domain of the supreme vehicle.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir snying brtse ba la sogs pa tshogs kyi sgrub pa bcu bdun dang / spang bar bya ba'i dgra rnams las nges par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir ched du bya ba'i don can la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa rnam pa brgyad do //üîΩde dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir snying brtse ba la sogs pa tshogs kyi sgrub pa bcu bdun dang / spang bar bya ba'i dgra rnams las nges par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir ched du bya ba'i don can la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa rnam pa brgyad do // de dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi /
translated: The seventeen practices of the assembly such as loving kindness are for the purpose of possessing extremely powerful roots of virtue. The eight practices of definite emergence such as the purpose of the object are for the purpose of definitely conquering the enemies that are to be abandoned.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: These are called the knowledge of all aspects of the perfect buddhas.

original: chos du zhig gis lam thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya zhe na //
analyzed: chos du zhig gis lam thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya zhe na //
translated: By how many qualities is the knowledge of all paths?üîΩThe path of the student, the rhinoceros,
